title: Saucy Chicken Teriyaki
directions: In a pan, over medium heat, cook chicken until no longer pink.
Once cooked take fork and shred chicken.
Add oil to pan & warm shredded chicken over medium heat.
Combine soy sauce, brown sugar, garlic and water and bring to a boil.
Add to pan with shredded chicken. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve over rice or aside steamed vegetables. And donâ€™t forget to sprinkle with some sesame!
ingredients: 1/2 cup Rice (white) cooked OR steamed vegetables
